Title: Bugs!
Plot: Steve and Blue are going on a bug-watching expedition and we're invited to come along. We help them to spot many neat bugs and once we've found them, we learn more about them and also theorize about why they do the things that they do. We also skidoo into a big bug book. There, we meet up with Antoinette, a worker ant on the first day at the job.
GuestStars: Brittany Herbert, Steven Penny, Alexandra Ressgiue, Amanda Sorkin, Lewis Sorkin, Brandan Spears, Amy Starr
